issue.title: [CF 1527] [SoulShardParts] broken
issue.body:
Hey, 

 

It appears with the new update Soul Shard Fragment tracking has been broken.

 

Resource display is fine, 10/10.

 

Text display dog-tag doesn't work correctly.  It initially works when I enter combat, displaying how many I have entering combat but never changes unless I exit combat and then enter it at a different number.

 

Many thanks, Mark


> Posted by CurseForge user Markofmir | Imported from CurseForge issue #1527 | Raw
